p: The viability of the parasites was assessed 30 to 40 min after removal from the peritoneal cavity, using the trypan blue exclusion method. To determine the number of tachyzoites, light microscopy with a hemocytometer was used. The tachyzoites were inoculated into a 75‐ml tissue culture flask containing proliferative Vero cells in a humidified 5% CO 2 incubator at 37°C (Bajelan et al., 2020).
